description: The Japanese anemone (Anemone hybrida 'September Charm') is a stunning addition to any garden. Its large pink and white blooms are eye-catching and reliably bloom from late summer through to fall. Its dark green, glossy foliage creates the perfect backdrop to the shades of pink, white, and even lavender and mauve flowers. It's easy to care for and maintains the same lush foliage all summer long, even in dry conditions. This hardy perennial grows in most soils and areas of sun or shade, making it an ideal choice for anyone wanting color in their garden all season long. Its flowers are loved by butterflies, and Japanese anemone is an ideal choice for anyone looking to add beauty and life to their garden.
